org.spf4j.base

Class AbstractRunnable

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.spf4j.base.AbstractRunnable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CheckedRunnable, RecyclingSupplierBuilder.AbstractRunnableImpl

    public abstract class AbstractRunnable
extends Object
implements Runnable
    Author:
    zoly

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int ERROR_EXIT_CODE 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AbstractRunnable() 
      AbstractRunnable(boolean lenient)
      If lenient is true, it means that nobody is waiting for this runnable's result(finish) so To not loose the exception, the runnable will LOG it as an error, and not retrow it
      AbstractRunnable(boolean lenient, String threadName)
      If lenient is true, it means that nobody is waiting for this runnable's result(finish) so To not loose the exception, the runnable will LOG it as an error and not rethrow it
      AbstractRunnable(String threadName)
